content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Hello Mister Li, thank you for coming to see my apartment. Based on the current market rates and the size of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 1500 Euros per month. content:

name: Baihu Li from China

content: Yes, Mister Li, that is correct. The monthly rental price of 1500 Euros includes all utilities and other expenses. There are no additional fees that you need to pay on top of that. I am glad to hear that you are interested in the apartment and I hope you decide to rent it. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:

Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Baihu Li, for your prompt response and for agreeing to the rental price. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement and I look forward to working with you in the future.
